channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The 65 Best Deals From REI’s 2025 Holiday Sale
item.description: The company that wants you to #optoutside for Black Friday is having its sale early. Gear up for next year with these great deals on packs, sleeping bags, merino wool, and more.

item.title: A new Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra rumor hints at a battery upgrade for the premium flagship phone
item.description: The latest rumor around the Galaxy S26 Ultra suggests the battery capacity will go up to 5,200 mAh.

item.title: Le Sonos Ace, aka le meilleur casque audio de 2024, perd 40 % de son prix pendant le Black Friday
item.description: Pour sa première incursion dans le monde des casques audio Bluetooth, Sonos a frappé fort avec son Ace hyper abouti, équilibré et bourré de technologies. Celui qu'on a qualifié de meilleur modèle l'an dernier est affiché à 299 euros au lieu de 499 euros sur Amazon, en pleine Black Friday Week.

item.title: 30+ best tech deals from the Currys Black Friday sale – an expert's top offers on TVs, laptops, appliances, and more
item.description: Here are over 30 of the best deals from the Currys Black Friday sale, hand-picked by a bargain-hunting expert.

item.title: Cheapest USB flash drives, Largest memory sticks, Fastest pen drives, Smallest thumb drives — I've gathered them all for Black Friday
item.description: Shopping for USB Flash Drive deals this Black Friday? Find your perfect removable storage in my guide

item.title: Did an AI war just get one step closer? Putin confirms Russia is planning its own national AI taskforce
item.description: Russia establishes a national AI taskforce to strengthen domestic LLMs, deploy humanoid robots, and develop autonomous drones for strategic operations.

item.title: Le télescope James-Webb révèle une spectaculaire fabrique de poussière au cœur d’un système stellaire unique
item.description: Parmi le bestiaire des étoiles insolites et remarquables, les astronomes connaissent celles qui furent découvertes en 1867 par Charles Wolf et Georges Rayet, de l'Observatoire de Paris. Les étoiles de Wolf-Rayet exploseront en supernovae, donnant parfois des sursauts gamma et des trous noirs....

item.title: The router wars are heating up - TP-Link says "smear campaign" by Netgear painted it as US national security risk
item.description: TP-Link is suing Netgear over false claims linking its routers to Chinese state-backed cyberattacks, alleging reputational damage and contract violations.

item.title: 11 Best MagSafe Wallets (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These convenient and slim magnetic wallets are the ones you’ll want to stick to the back of your smartphone.

item.title: How to watch Arsenal vs Tottenham live streams: TV channels and preview for North London Derby
item.description: We'll show you all the ways to watch Arsenal take on Tottenham in the Premier League from anywhere in the world.

item.title: Robin Hood episode 5 highlights the biggest problem I have with the MGM+ show, but the showrunners think it’s ‘grounded’
item.description: Steamy scenes have been a regular feature in the MGM+ series Robin Hood, but episode 5 kicks things up a notch. I'm not a fan, but the creators are convinced it's 'grounded'.

item.title: The 7 best Black Friday 75-inch TV deals, starting from just $379
item.description: Affordable smart TVs to high-end OLEDs, we've picked the best 75-inch and 77-inch TVs whatever your budget

item.title: Walmart's Black Friday sale starts tomorrow – here's everything I'm buying as a deals editor
item.description: Walmart's Black Friday sale starts tomorrow - here's everything you need to know, plus shop today's best deals on AirPods, TVs, air fryers, vacuums, and more.

item.title: Panasonic Z95B OLED TV Review: Glorious Performance, One Small Catch
item.description: Panasonic’s new flagship OLED is one of the best TVs I’ve ever seen (or heard).

item.title: Carl Pei confirme AirDrop sur Nothing : « Le partage ne devrait pas dépendre de son smartphone »
item.description: In s'en doutait, mais c'est allé vite. À peine Google a-t-il fait tomber les murs entre Android et iOS avec le Pixel 10, que la concurrence s'engouffre dans la brèche. Carl Pei, le patron de Nothing, vient de confirmer l'évidence : ses smartphones seront bientôt compatibles AirDrop.

item.title: Forget the Oura Ring 4 – the Samsung Galaxy Ring has dropped to its lowest-ever Black Friday price
item.description: Don't want to pay the Oura Ring 4's monthly fee? There's a 30% off Black Friday deal on the Samsung Galaxy Ring right now.

item.title: The tiny Nespresso Vertuo Pop coffee maker is yours for just £55 for Black Friday – and you get 50 free coffee pods too
item.description: The tiniest Nespresso Vertuo machine just got even more tempting with a record-low price and heaps of free coffee.

item.title: Google Nest Doorbell Cam (2025) Review: I’m So Tired of Subscriptions
item.description: The latest Nest Doorbell is great hardware plagued by a bad subscription approach.

item.title: 9 Best Chromebooks of 2025: All the Latest Models, Tested
item.description: Choosing a Chromebook that isn’t terrible can feel like dodging bullets. We’ve tested all of the latest models and can point you in the right direction.

item.title: Apple TV wants to go big
item.description: This is The Stepback, a weekly newsletter breaking down one essential story from the tech world. For more on streaming competition, follow Andrew Webster. item.title: Harmonizing AI innovation with cost, risk & ROI
item.description: The challenge is how to demonstrate the value of AI-enhanced processes and prove the tangible return on investment (ROI).

item.title: Trois mois avec Runna : j’ai utilisé l’application de running de Strava pour enfin avoir un record digne de ce nom sur 10 km
item.description: Pour préparer une course de 10 km, j'ai utilisé quotidiennement l'application de coaching rachetée par Strava, en début d'année. Résultat de la course, j'ai enfin un chrono de référence sur la distance.

item.title: Xiaomi France lance la SU7 et la SU7 Ultra : sortez la carte bleue, c’est moins cher qu’un Redmi
item.description: C'est la surprise pour le Black Friday. En naviguant ce matin sur le Mi Store français, nous sommes tombés nez à nez avec la Xiaomi SU7 et sa version démoniaque, la SU7 Ultra. Disponibles immédiatement, livrées chez vous, et éligibles à un coupon de réduction.

item.title: T-Mobile Black Friday deals 2025: get $1,000 off iPhone 17, Galaxy S25, Pixel 10, plus our expert buying tips
item.description: Our expert picks for today's best T-Mobile Black Friday deals, including how to get four iPhone 17 for free with a plan.

item.title: Save up to $130 off drip coffee makers with these Black Friday deals from Breville, Aarke and more
item.description: Love your coffee delicious and plentiful? I've got all the best Black Friday offers on drip coffee makers from big brands right here.
